body:
Hey guys. Today i've made the decision to stop playing on avicus. Sadly school is more important, and I must make a commitment to getting my grades up. Don't worry though, i'll be back...next year. Who knows, I might hop on nebula for a game or two if I have time. Love you guys! Merry christmas! Happy new year!

-C_P 

p.s: I'll keep on making discussion starters! I'll be on forums!

replies.body: I hope you best of luck in life, sad to see you go right before Christmas :c. You've been a really good person in the Avicus community, and Im sure a lot pf players will be joyed to see you back next summer. Have a good time in school, Best of luck in exams, and hope you will stay with the MC and Avicus Spirit! :)
